= Libraries ready for use with Ajde =

<wiki:toc max_depth="2" />

== HTMLPurifier ==

Put the `library` folder of the Lite distribution of HTMLPurifier ([http://htmlpurifier.org/download download here]) in the `lib` folder of Ajde, and rename it to `HTMLPurifier`.
